abstract: Fusion will anchor Univision’s new Fusion Media Group, to be distributed on a mix of digital and traditional media.
snippet: Fusion will anchor Univision’s new Fusion Media Group, to be distributed on a mix of digital and traditional media.
lead_paragraph: The Spanish-language broadcaster Univision announced Thursday that it had acquired full control of Fusion, the joint venture it started with the Walt Disney Company in 2013.

headline.main: Univision Buys Out Disney’s Stake in Fusion
headline.print_headline: Univision Buys Disney Stake in Their Joint Venture Fusion
